When photographing zoo animals, don’t get too close to the cages, and never tap on the glass or throw things between the bars of a cage.

definition.zh_def: 輕輕敲擊或觸碰的動作。
definition.en_def: To strike or touch lightly, often to make a sound or to get attention.
definition.example: She gave the door a gentle tap to announce her arrival.
